EmailTemplate.name: 10-07-22 Channel Partner Webinar Invite.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited: October 20 Banking Partner Webcast (USA)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: You're invited: October 20 Banking Partner Webcast (USA) Dear Partners, Please join us for our latest NCR Banking Partner Webcast. This informative session will be hosted by our team of subject matter experts and will include several topics to help drive your business. Note: This event requires registration. Please register NOW by clicking the button below. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Date: Thursday, October 20, 2022 Where: Virtual via Microsoft Teams Time: 3p.m. to 4p.m. ET We look forward to gathering with everyone later this month. Best regards, Robert Malik Global Banking Channel Sales Leader <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
